m_szDocTitle: Auto Expo 2016: Hyundai unveils Tucson, showcases Hyundai N 2025 Vision Gran Turismo
m_szDocSumamry: Auto Expo 2016: Hyundai unveils Tucson, showcases Hyundai N 2025 Vision Gran Turismo India Infoline News Service          |          Mumbai |          February 03, 2016         11:16 IST The Tucson design expresses progressive spirit and passion, transforming the brand to New Age Hyundai. The All-New Tucson has a bold and athletic presence achieved through refined, flowing surfaces, bold proportions, sharp lines and most importantly, the newest generation hexagonal grille – Hyundai brand signature.
